Home » Videos » Video: Nigeria should adopt regional Houses of Assembly- Ben Murray Bruce Video: Nigeria should adopt regional Houses of Assembly- Ben Murray Bruce On 6:35 pm In Videos by Okogba Comments 
Senator Ben Murray-Bruce representing Bayelsa East Constituency at the Upper Chamber of the National Assembly has posited that Nigeria cannot afford the current system where each state has a House of Assembly especially when the present economic condition of the country is taken into consideration. 
Speaking via a video he made, Senator Bruce explained that unless Nigeria makes common sense reforms to her body politics, she will never make much progress.
